name: Design System For Website
description:
Hello Creators

Hope you all are doing great!!

First of all Happy New Year to all of you. May this year bring you good health and happiness.


(Version 1.3)

Added the New buttons components and Typographical Heading style go and grab the system. It's easy to use and modifications is so simple do it as per your requirements.


(Version 1.2)

Added the standalone checkbox, Status and heading

element here with dark and light version


(Version 1.1)

I have designed this system, Here you can find some Basic buttons and social media icons with input box.


Apart from that this design system also include the Auto Layout Feature, Figma Variant & interactive prototype.


let's connect on Figma.
